description: This file contains test functions for image processing and model response validation using the Agent class with the LlamaOpenAI model, including downloading an image and testing responses to image inputs in different formats.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class responsible for running models and processing inputs.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: A media class representing an image, either from a file path or raw bytes.

classes.name: LlamaOpenAI
classes.description: A model class representing the Llama OpenAI model with specific configurations.

methods.name: download_image
methods.description: A utility function to download an image from a URL to a specified output path.

methods.name: Path.joinpath
methods.description: Method to join paths in pathlib.

methods.name: Path.read_bytes
methods.description: Method to read the contents of a file as bytes.

methods.name: Agent.run
methods.description: Method to execute the agent with a prompt and inputs, returning a response.
